means: 烤，烘，焙( roast的现在分词 )

word_mean: 将净药材或切制品外包裹一层能吸附油质如湿润的面粉或纸浆等辅料，再埋入加热的滑石粉煨烫，或将切制品层层隔纸加热烘煨的炮制方法。

entry.def: If someone gives you a roasting, they criticize you severely about something in a way that shows that they are very annoyed with you.

example.ex: The team was given a roasting by manager Alex Feguson.
example.tran: 这个团队遭到了亚历克斯·费格森经理的严厉批评。

means.word_mean: 1. cooking (meat) by dry heat in an oven (usually with fat added);

auth_sentence.content: Spoon most of the fat from the roasting tin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Spoon most of the fat from the roasting tin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Spoon most of the fat from the roasting tin.

auth_sentence.content: Place the lamb into a deep sided roasting tin.
auth_sentence.res_content: Place the lamb into a deep sided roasting tin.

auth_sentence.content: They do their bean roasting in a pastry oven!

sentences.en: Can’t we open a window?I’m roasting.
sentences.cn: 可不可以开一扇窗?烤死我了。

means.word_mean: 严厉批评；受到严厉批评

sentences.en: I’d better go. I’ll get a roasting if I’m late again!
sentences.cn: 我还是走吧。要是又迟到，我该挨批了。
